entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 80
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH 15 TO 20 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
